alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 4:29PM CDT until August 25 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Devils Den State Park to 3 miles southwest of Chester, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Mountainburg... Alma... Mulberry... Dyer... Chester... Rudy... Lake Fort Smith... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 11 and 13, and near mile marker 20. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
